resources.string: Allowing the app to use your phone\'s GPS location provider will allow us to autodetect your city to provide a localized heatwave prediction. If you do not wish to grant access to the GPS provider, deny the upcoming request and select your city manually from the dropdown in the app.
Enable GPS location service to find current location. Click OK to go to location services settings to let you do so.
Alerts given out by the app in case a heatwave is expected in your area in the next few days
A heatwave is expected to occur in your area.
A heatwave is expected to occur in your area today and the next few days. Please stay indoors, in a cool location to ensure your safety
Press \"Check\" to quickly check for a heatwave alert in your area
Enable the app\'s background service to have the app automatically check for alerts in your area once a day and notify you of any new alerts
Enable this checkbox to allow the app to continuously monitor your heart rate and notify you any anomalies due to heat exhaustion
